Module com.example.demo
Package com.game.start

Class GameScene

java.lang.Object
com.game.start.GameScene
class GameScene extends Object
This class creates the Game scene.

  • Method Details

    • setN

      static void setN(int number)
      This method sets size of grid. E.g. when number=4, gird is 4x4.
      Parameters:
      number - The number of grids.

    • getLENGTH

      static double getLENGTH()
      This method returns the length of scene window.
      Returns:
      length of window.

    • randomFillNumber

      private void randomFillNumber(int turn)
      This method finds all empty cells in grid.
      Parameters:
      turn - Which turn since starting the game.

    • put2or4

      private void put2or4(int aForBound, int bForBound, Cell[][] emptyCells)
      This method randomly select 2 or 4 to be input into cell.
      Parameters:
      aForBound - Used to determine random empty grid's column.
      bForBound - Used to determine random empty grid's row.
      emptyCells - Empty cells in grid.

    • haveEmptyCell

      private int haveEmptyCell()
      This method checks if there's still empty cells in grid and presence of cell 2048.
      Returns:
      -1 if no more empty cell and 1 if still have empty cell with the exception of cell number = 2048, in which case, return 0.

    • passDestination

      private int passDestination(int i, int j, char direct)
      This method passes the next destination of cell after move.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      direct - Which direction to move according to key pressed.
      Returns:
      coordinate of cell to move to if arrow keys pressed, -1 otherwise.

    • getCoordinate

      private int getCoordinate(char direct, int i, int j, int coordinate)
      This method determines the coordinate for cell to move.
      Parameters:
      direct - Which direction to move according to key pressed.
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      coordinate - Determines cell moving vertically or horizontally.
      Returns:
      coordinate of cell to move to.

    • moveLeft

      private void moveLeft()
      This method moves cell to the leftmost available cell.

    • moveRight

      private void moveRight()
      This method moves cell to rightmost available cell.

    • moveUp

      private void moveUp()
      This method moves cell to up-most available cell.

    • moveDown

      private void moveDown()
      This method moves cell to down-most available cell.

    • isValidDesH

      private boolean isValidDesH(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      This method checks if destination for cell to move is valid on the horizontal plane.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      des - destination of cell.
      sign - Determine to go right by increasing x coordinate by 1, or left by decreasing by 1.
      Returns:
      true if destination is available, false otherwise.

    • moveHorizontally

      private void moveHorizontally(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      This method changes cells if needed after moving horizontally.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      des - destination of cell.
      sign - Determine to go right by increasing x coordinate by 1, or left by decreasing by 1.

    • isValidDesV

      private boolean isValidDesV(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      This method checks if destination for cell to move is valid on the vertical plane.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      des - destination of cell.
      sign - Determine to go down by increasing y coordinate by 1, or up by decreasing by 1.
      Returns:
      true if destination is available, false otherwise.

    • moveVertically

      private void moveVertically(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      This method changes cells if needed after moving horizontally.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      des - destination of cell.
      sign - Determine to go down by increasing y coordinate by 1, or up by decreasing by 1.

    • haveSameNumberNearly

      private boolean haveSameNumberNearly(int i, int j)
      This method checks if neighbouring cell have same value.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if neighbouring cell have same value, false otherwise.

    • canNotMove

      private boolean canNotMove()
      This method checks if there are still moves which can be made in game.
      Returns:
      true if unable to move to any cell, false otherwise.

    • game

      void game(javafx.scene.Scene gameScene, javafx.scene.Group root, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.Scene endGameScene, javafx.scene.Group endGameRoot)
      This method creates the game scene.
      Parameters:
      gameScene - Container for game scene.
      root - Group of components to be displayed on Game scene.
      primaryStage - Container for a scene.
      endGameScene - Container for Game Over scene.
      endGameRoot - Group of components to be displayed on Game Over scene.
